mapper.insert: insert into dict_data ( id, dict_code, dict_name, dict_value, dict_soft, create_time )values( #{id}, #{dictCode}, #{dictName}, #{dictValue}, #{dictSoft}, #{createTime} )

insert into dict_data ( id, dict_code, dict_name, dict_value, dict_soft, create_time )values ( #{item.id}, #{item.dictCode}, #{item.dictName}, #{item.dictValue}, #{item.dictSoft}, #{item.createTime} )

update.foreach:
update dict_data set id=#{item.id}, dict_code=#{item.dictCode}, dict_name=#{item.dictName}, dict_value=#{item.dictValue}, dict_soft=#{item.dictSoft}, create_time=#{item.createTime}
where id=#{item.id}
